positions.description: • Driving Agile Scrum ceremonies such as backlog refinement, sprint planning, daily standup, demo and retrospection. •Review and analyze the blockages for team with parallelly engaging in scenario creation and test case review. • Tracking and managing project execution; dealing with requirement clarification &  analysis/risk identification. •Ensuring that the the project is delivered in timely manner; Coordinating with the product owner and rest of the team. • Tracking and managing project execution ; dealing with capacity planning
positions.title: Scrum Master
positions.description_html:
• Driving Agile Scrum ceremonies such as backlog refinement, sprint planning, daily standup, demo and retrospection.
•Review and analyze the blockages for team with parallelly engaging in scenario creation and test case review.
• Tracking and managing project execution; dealing with requirement clarification & analysis/risk identification.
•Ensuring that the the project is delivered in timely manner; Coordinating with the product owner and rest of the team.
• Tracking and managing project execution ; dealing with capacity planning

recommendations: Shahnawaaz Shaikh “Adit Sanjanwala is most likely one of the most influential professionals to work with. His hands-on strategy in leadership, management, coaching and powerful personality gained him the respect of the team. Adit Sanjanwala leads by example and many people at Verizon find his enthusiasm and dedication inspiring and motivating. He is not only a reliable and forward-thinking scrum master but also an inspiring team player. For Adit Sanjanwala the job is always the most important thing to do. Very positive attitude towards work. Definitely someone I'd want to have on my team.”
